about_the_game:
...Upon your prison release, you discover your father's passing. He left you with his old garage, vintage car, and camera gear. With no other options in sight, you choose to follow his advice: "Take what I've given you and start making an honest living son".
Your path leads you to StreamSphere, a fictitious online platform, where you strive to master the most difficult drifts and post videos about them, always aiming to go viral and rise to the top of the drifting scene. Your ultimate goal is what you've always envisioned—a legal life in your dream home.

content_descriptors.notes: This game presents a mature depiction of modern life, incorporating elements like shooting mechanics, realistic interactions, and storytelling. It includes occasional strong language and depictions of recreational drug use within contextual boundaries. These aspects aim to spark discussions and critical thinking among players, especially young adults. Responsible consumption is encouraged, and parents are advised to engage in conversations about the content. The game strives to resonate with players while promoting thoughtful exploration of the presented themes.
